name: Reason to Smile
description:
Smile has always been a part of our everyday life journey. It could make someone else’s day, it could empower us, it could be a way to navigate through difficult times, it could also be a thing to start your day and week.

In this Reason to Smile, I would love to bring the smiles people showed me when I travelled to Lombok, Thai and India. This also a reminder that in order to get someone’s smile, we need to be able to create a safe space where everyone feels dafe to express and be themselves. So be it, let your Monday be full of smiles and let you be someone’s reason to smile.

Looping Mp4 without sound.
